title: Freedom and Reform Party
text:
The Freedom and Reform Party (, ÖRP) was a <a href="Liberalism">liberal</a> <a href="list%20of%20political%20parties%20in%20Northern%20Cyprus">political party</a> in the <a href="Northern%20Cyprus">Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus</a>.
The party was formed in 2006 by four former MP's from the <a href="National%20Unity%20Party%20%28Northern%20Cyprus%29">National Unity Party</a> (UBP) and the <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28Northern%20Cyprus%29">Democratic Party (DP)</a>. This party served as the junior coalition partner in the former "<a href="de%20facto">de facto</a>" TRNC Government consisting of itself and the <a href="Republican%20Turkish%20Party">Republican Turkish Party</a> led by <a href="Mehmet%20Ali%20Talat">Mehmet Ali Talat</a>.
Party Leader <a href="Turgay%20Avc%C4%B1">Turgay Avcı</a> served in the TRNC Cabinet as <a href="Deputy%20Prime%20Minister">Deputy Prime Minister</a> and <a href="Minister%20of%20Foreign%20Affairs">Minister of Foreign Affairs</a>.
